Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.discovery

Interface to the Mobile Connect Discovery SDK.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDiscovery
    Interface for discovering operator end points that are used for OpenID Connect authorization.
    IDiscoveryResponseCallback
    Interface used by methods in IDiscovery to pass responses to the calling application.
    IParsedDiscoveryRedirectCallback
    Interface to capture the response from IDiscovery.parseDiscoveryRedirect(String, IParsedDiscoveryRedirectCallback)
    IPreferences
    Interface to configuration data for the Mobile Connect SDK.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheOptions
    Class used to identify data in the discovery response cache.
    CompleteSelectedOperatorDiscoveryOptions
    Class to hold the optional parameters for IDiscovery.completeSelectedOperatorDiscovery(String, String, String, String, String, String, CompleteSelectedOperatorDiscoveryOptions, List, IDiscoveryResponseCallback)
    DiscoveryOptions
    Optional parameters for the IDiscovery.startAutomatedOperatorDiscovery(IPreferences, String, DiscoveryOptions, List, IDiscoveryResponseCallback) method.
    DiscoveryResponse
    Class to hold a Discovery Response.
    ParsedDiscoveryRedirect
    Class to hold the details parsed from the Discovery Redirect
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DiscoveryException
    Class to hold discovery exceptions.

Package com.gsma.mobileconnect.discovery Description

Interface to the Mobile Connect Discovery SDK.

The main interface is IDiscovery, see Factory.getDiscovery(com.gsma.mobileconnect.cache.IDiscoveryCache).
